Title: NNPC/Seplat JV marks 30 years of training, apprentice graduation, 2m incident-free offshore man-hours
Summary: The NNPC/Seplat Joint Venture has celebrated a historic triple milestone, marking 30 years of the Technical Training Centre (TTC) The NTC has graduated 2m incident-free offshore man-hours .

Title: Army foils robbery, rescues kidnap victims, recovers weapons in Taraba
Summary: Troops of the Nigerian Army’s 6 Brigade/Sector 3 Operation Whirl Stroke have foiled a robbery attack, rescued abducted travellers, and recovered weapons . The operations were disclosed in a statement issued on Tuesday .

Title: 2027: Akutah pledges security, welfare, infrastructure  if elected Benue governor
Summary: Executive Secretary of the Nigerian Shippers Council, Dr Pius Akutah, pledges security, welfare, infrastructure if elected Governor in 2027 . Dr Akuttah has assured the Benue people that his tenure will prioritise security, . welfare and infrastructure .

Title: Northern youth hails Tinubu’s security reform
Summary: The Northern Nigeria Christian Youth Association (NNCYA) commended Why President Bola Ahmed Tinubu must act fast to save NNPC now . The association has commended the President for his commitment to tackling the growing security challenges in Nigeria, particularly in the northern regions .

Title: Why Mohbad’s widow is refusing public DNA test – Aloba’s lawyer
Summary: Legal counsel to the father of Mohbad insists that the father has never attempted to manipulate the DNA process . Mohbad's widow is refusing public DNA test – Aloba’s lawyer .

Title: Peter Obi and the ADC: Is the honeymoon already over?
Summary: The Obi-or-Nothing agenda implies that the ADC leadership must hand its presidential ticket to Peter Obi unopposed . Peter Obi and the ADC: Is the honeymoon already over?

Title: How attacks in 3 Anambra communities left many people dead, property worth millions of naira burnt
Summary: Several communities in Anambra State were thrown into fear and chaos over the weekend . Many people were killed and property worth millions of naira destroyed in different parts of the state .

Title: Shallipopi, other Nigerians dominate wins at TikTok awards
Summary: According to the organisation, Shallipopi’s hit track, “Laho” was dominated charts and fuelled viral trends across the continent .

Title: Two dead, several injured as tanker, truck crashes trigger massive gridlock on Lagos bridges
Summary: Two people lost their lives while others sustained critical injuries following multiple early-morning crashes involving heavy-duty vehicles on the Lagos-Ibadan Expressway and the Third Mainland Bridge on Monday, triggering hours of traffic chaos .

Title: State police will end insecurity in six months if approved – Gani Adams
Summary: Nigeria's worsening security challenges can be brought under control within six months if approved, says Gani Adams . State police will end insecurity in six months, he says .

Title: Why my lineage qualifies me for Awujale throne — K1 De-Ultimate
Summary: Fuji artist, Wasiu Ayinde, popularly known as K1 De-Ultimate, has slammed critics questioning his lineage . The 67-year-old musician invoked the spirit of the late Awujale of Ijebuland, Oba Sikiru Adetona, to intercede in the controversial claim of his

Title: France to return smuggled dinosaur skeleton to Mongolia
Summary: Most Widely Read Newspaper Credit: RailPass Kindly share this story: France was to hand over a 70-million-year-old dinosaur skeleton to Mongolia on Monday . The “extremely rare” fossil of a Tarbosaurus baatar, considered to be the Asian cousin of the fearsome Tyrannosaurus rex, was seized

Title: La Liga: Alonso faults referee over Real Madrid's 2-0 defeat to Celta
Summary: Real Madrid manager Xabi Alonso has launched a fierce criticism of the match official after his side’s defeat to Celta Vigo . Alonso said a series of poor refereeing decisions ‘drove the team crazy’ and contributed heavily to the loss . Real Madrid finished the game with nine men after red cards for Fran Garc

Title: Step-by-step guide on how to register for 2026 UTME
Summary: The 2026 JAMB UTME form will be on sale from January to March 2026 . The board has released a detailed guide for candidates preparing to register for the 2026 Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination . The update was published on the Board’s official X handle on Sunday .

Title: Lagos to rebuild police stations destroyed in #EndSARS unrest
Summary: The #EndSARS movement began as peaceful demonstrations against the controversial Special Anti-Robbery Squad over alleged brutality . It later escalated into violent clashes across Lagos, resulting in the destruction of police stations, courts and other public buildings . The rebuilding effort is expected to address critical security gaps left in the aftermath of the 2020 unrest .
